jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: We're looking for a talented Software Engineer to join our team. You'll work on building scalable distributed systems using Python, Go, and modern cloud technologies. Experience with Kubernetes and microservices architecture is a plus.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: Join Meta to build the future of social technology. We're seeking experienced engineers to work on React, GraphQL, and large-scale infrastructure. This is a senior-level position requiring 5+ years of experience.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Build payment infrastructure for the internet. Work with Ruby, Python, and modern databases. We're looking for someone passionate about APIs and distributed systems.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: Create amazing user experiences with React and TypeScript. Join our frontend team to build the next generation of travel products. Strong CSS and design skills required.

jobs.title: Staff Software Engineer
jobs.description: Lead technical initiatives at Netflix. This staff-level position requires deep expertise in distributed systems, Java, and cloud infrastructure. You'll mentor junior engineers and drive architectural decisions.

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
jobs.description: Work on AWS services used by millions. Build highly available systems with Java and Python. Experience with distributed systems and databases required.

jobs.title: Software Engineer II
jobs.description: Join Azure to build cloud infrastructure. Work with C#, .NET, and Kubernetes. This is a mid-level position perfect for engineers with 2-4 years of experience.

jobs.title: Ruby Developer
jobs.description: Build e-commerce solutions with Ruby on Rails. Work on our core platform used by millions of merchants. Strong understanding of web development and databases needed.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer - Python
jobs.description: Shape the future of music streaming. Build scalable APIs and data pipelines with Python. Experience with Kafka and event-driven architecture is a plus.

jobs.title: Principal Software Engineer
jobs.description: Lead software development for autonomous driving systems. This principal-level role requires extensive experience in C++, computer vision, and real-time systems. Shape the future of transportation.
